subject: Schematics
author: Urkel23
full_text:
I don't think that the minibox schematics were ever public knowledge.  I do know that it is based off of the MK484 chip, which frank uses in his TRF boxes so he might have that for you.

I also know that each box changes and is different, i have a page of some of those schematics.

http://www.stevehultay.com/ghostboxschematics.html

Hope this helps you,
-Steve H.



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Shaun Burris <paranormalmaster1@...> wrote:
>
> Hey guys and gals im trying to build a new type of minibox design does anyone 
> have the systems breakdown for a franks box or mini??
>
